pkgmetadata.longdescription: A package on the Schwartz two-factor commodity model // This package provides detailed functionality for working with the Schwartz 1997 two-factor commodity model. Essentially, it contains pricing formulas for futures and European options and the standard d/p/q/r functions for the distribution of the state variables and futures prices. In addition, a parameter estimation procedure is contained together with many utilities as filtering and plotting functionality. This package is accompanied by futures data of ten commodities.
